directions: Combine the pork tenderloin, beer, vinegar, potatoes, carrots, mushrooms, garlic, onion, salt, peppercorns, and sage in a slow cooker. Cover and cook on low for 4 hours.
ingredients: 6 fluid ounces lager-style beer (such as Molson Canadian ®)
title: Slow Cooker Pork Tenderloin with Beer and Veggies
